trends: There has been one other sighting in Yanceyville
There were no other sightings in Yanceyville on or around October 5th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailshusband called we ourside where he was walking my grandson in the yard and pointed up into the sky, bright blue a few scattering of clouds coming from the northeast. "what in the world is going on ?" he asked pointing out serveral cigar things high up in the sky flying fast to the southeast He said I have seen several of these things one after the other going both direction even crisscrossing each other then there was a helicropter way up high following m just then I saw on coming from the north west going southeast quickly followed by a second one higher up then one coming in the opposite direction no vaper trails at all and no noise then a jet at a much lower level only it was white. I have never seen a military type jet that was white came over going west. then two more of these things high up going east. Its looks like a highway at rush hour up there what is going on. I'm going back outside to watch some more and see if I can get a picture.
Summary: like a cigar or tube no visible wings
